articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction as England beat Finland, plus build-up to Wales v Montenegro.
articles.title: Nations League: England beat Finland plus Wales v Montenegro build-up

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes is fit to play in the second Test against Pakistan in Multan, coming in alongside pace bowler Matthew Potts.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Ben Stokes and Matthew Potts return for second Test

articles.description: England's latest international camp has been riddled with confusion on the pitch and off it, Phil McNulty looks at what next for Lee Carsley and the Football Association.
articles.title: Finland 1-3 England: Clock ticking for Lee Carsley & FA after week of confusion

articles.description: Lamar Jackson wins his match-up with Jayden Daniels, the Detroit Lions dominate the Dallas Cowboys, and the Buccaneers score 51 points in New Orleans.
articles.title: NFL results & week six recap: Lamar Jackson beats Jayden Daniels and Detroit Lions dominate Dallas Cowboys

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold played at left-back and scored for England in the win against Finland. But did the experiment work?
articles.title: 'I joked I'd give him £500 if he scored' – did Trent Alexander-Arnold's left-back experiment work?

articles.description: As we mark the 10th year of BBC's Women's Footballer of the Year award, can you name all nine previous winners?
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year: Can you name previous winners?

articles.description: Republic of Ireland striker Troy Parrott gives his support to Caoimhin Kelleher after the keeper's mistake leads to Greece's second goal in their 2-0 Nations Cup win on Sunday.
articles.title: Nations League: Parrott backs Republic of Irelland keeper Kelleher after costly mistake in Athens

articles.description: Wales have struggled to close out matches in the early stages of Craig Bellamy's tenure as head coach.
articles.title: Craig Bellamy: Why are Wales tailing off in games under new head coach?

articles.description: Mike de Decker causes a huge upset as he beats defending champion Luke Humphries 6-4 to win the World Grand Prix title.
articles.title: World Grand Prix darts: Mike de Decker stuns Luke Humphries to win title

articles.description: Australia secure their place in the Women's T20 World Cup semi-finals with a nine-run over India, who face a nervous wait to see if they will also qualify.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Australia beat India to qualify for semi-finals
